Name: Grandpa
About the game: Grandpa is a survival horror game. In the game you are controlling a man who was kidnapped by an old man. You have to escape from the house by solving the puzzles in the game with the first person perspective. There are a lot of puzzles in there. and they all interact with each other. Open the closed doors. you must escape the traps. Grandpa caught you and locked you in your home. You have to escape from the house! You have to solve the puzzles inside the house! If you are so scared, you will have to close your eyes. When you calm down, the character will open his eyes He hears everything. If you find syringes. Stick it in the grandpa and neutralize it. Certainly the effect will pass after a while. You can hide in wardrobes or desk. If you drop something, he hears it and comes running.
